utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +1 | blank_name = Climate | blank_info = Aw }} Kaduna is the state capital of Kaduna State in north-western Nigeria, on the Kaduna River. It is the capital of the former Northern Region of Nigeria. The first premier of Northern Nigeria, Alhaji Ahmadu Bello, conducted government business from Kaduna. ==References== Category:Cities in Nigeria Category:State capitals in Nigeria Category:Kaduna State
